content.title: Welcome to US Medieval Roleplay!
content.text:
The age of dragons, blades, and survival begins...

- Explore a living medieval world filled with PvP, RP, and Fantasy!
- Stay updated here, on our Wiki, and Discord for events and updates.


</><TextStyle.Red>Current Issues/Bugs:</>
- some resources are rendering in-game, but are not able to be harvested. Expected to be fixed with an ark update/n</><TextStyle.Green>Recent Updates:</>
- Added Dark Age 2 Weapons, HUDAscended, ArkNav
- Added Loadout Dummy mod and Atlas Trading Ship
- New primitive weapons and ammo added to loot
- Canteens and hazard suit pieces added to drops
- Enabled ASR Batch Paint Mode
- Increased imprint rate (fewer imprints needed)
- Resource regrow radius reduced to 0.3 (more regrowth)
- Removed Bob's Tales and oddvar weapons
- Adjusted cannon/ballista/catapult drop rates
- Slightly increased griffin spawn (0.5 → 0.75)
- Custom Dynamic Config enabled for ASA

<TextStyle.Orange>Older Changes:</>
- Ported old server settings to ASA backend
- Updated all loot tables and drop balancing
- All saddles spawn in drops with proper quality
- Increased fuel duration from 1.25x → 1.5x
- Enabled server gameplay logging
- Fixed broken cave drop tags and odd engrams
- Increased tribe log size to 5000 entries
- Re-enabled Resonant Shop + added starter kits, etc.,/n Panel Last Updated: 20240606

content.title: Primitive Survival
content.text: No Tek, No Guns — just bows, swords, tames, and traps. Build smart, hide well, and outplay your enemies.

content.title: Rich RP Systems
content.text: Create towns, kingdoms, and alliances through roleplay. Run shops, events, and claim titles. RP supported.

content.title: Fantasy Tames
content.text: Tame dragons, gryphons, meraxes, and magical beasts. Many have special evolution paths or powers.

content.title: Balanced PvP
content.text: Raiding allowed but tuned — structure resistance x0.8, damage x1.5. PvP is strategic, not zerg-based.

content.title: Server Rates & Info
content.text:
XP: 1.0x | Taming: 1.5x | Gathering: 1.5x

� Tribe Size Limit: 8
� No Alliances (Trading OK)
❌ No Wipes — your world is persistent.

content.title: Server-Side Plugins
content.text:
- Better Spawn Distribution
- No Building on Spawn Points
- UnicodeRCON ASA
- Auto Dino Settings
- WBUI2 Interface
(More info in Discord / Wiki)

content.title: Creatures & Tames
content.text:
<TextStyle.Yellow>Dragon's Kingdom</> – Tame & evolve dragons using Alpha Dragon Tooth
<TextStyle.Yellow>Marnii Griffins</> – Fantasy griffins with high mobility
<TextStyle.Yellow>Meraxes</> – KO tame with unique powers
<TextStyle.Yellow>Atlas Big Cats</> – Tigers & lions
<TextStyle.Yellow>Gryphons</> – Lightweight flying beasts

content.title: Structures & RP Deco
content.text:
<TextStyle.Green>CKF</> – Modular medieval castle system
<TextStyle.Green>Arkitect Structures</> – ASR Primitive Bench & advanced snap points
<TextStyle.Green>RR Medieval Structures</> – Immersive castles and builds
<TextStyle.Green>RR RP Deco</> – Roleplay props and furniture
<TextStyle.Green>Wall'n'Floor</> – Trim pieces and polish
<TextStyle.Green>Fery's Pathways</> – Ground textures and decor
<TextStyle.Green>Additional Gates</> – More structural variety
<TextStyle.Green>Astraeos Trireme Ships</> – Ancient sea vessels

content.title: Gear, UI, QoL
content.text:
<TextStyle.Blue>Cliffans Wardrobe</> – Custom medieval outfits
<TextStyle.Blue>Cliffans Backpacks</> – Extra carry weight
<TextStyle.Blue>Cliffans Weapon Skins</> – Stylized gear
<TextStyle.Blue>HUD Durability</> – Visual item health
<TextStyle.Blue>HUDAscended</> – Modern UI experience
<TextStyle.Blue>ArkNav</> – Minimap and GPS
<TextStyle.Blue>Better Rafts</> – Faster water travel
<TextStyle.Blue>Loadout Mannequin</> – Save & apply gear kits
<TextStyle.Blue>Marnii Hairstyles</> – Hair customization
<TextStyle.Blue>Cliffans RP Emotes</> – Emotes & poses

content.title: Utilities & Survival
content.text:
<TextStyle.Orange>Primitive Weaponry</> – Crossbows, spears, flintlocks
<TextStyle.Orange>Dark Age 2 Weapons</> – Expanded melee arsenal
<TextStyle.Orange>Return The Beacons</> – Corpse/dino locators
<TextStyle.Orange>ASA API Utils</> – Plugin support backbone
<TextStyle.Orange>Admin Tools</> – Server control utilities
<TextStyle.Orange>Resonant's Shop Mod</> – In-game economy tools
<TextStyle.Orange>Atlas Trading Ship</> – Sailing merchant craft
<TextStyle.Orange>Awesome ARK Tools</> – Various build & debug aids
<TextStyle.Orange>WBUI2</> – This interactive UI

content.title: Frequently Asked Questions
content.text:
<TextStyle.Yellow>How do I tame a dragon?</>
- Knock out with arrows or modded weapons, use special saddle from Dragon's Kingdom bench.
- To evolve, collect an Alpha Dragon Tooth.

<TextStyle.Yellow>What are Bushberries (BB)?</>
- BB are your in-game currency, earned by playing, voting, ranking up, and events.

<TextStyle.Yellow>Where can I find help?</>
- Use this menu, visit the Wiki, or ask in Discord!

content.title: Player Commands
content.text:
- <TextStyle.Yellow>+register</> → Begin linking your Discord (see Discord for full process).

<TextStyle.Red>Note:</> More commands are on the way.
Stay tuned via Discord for live feature updates.
